alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 1:01AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN WAKULLA... SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON AND SOUTH CENTRAL LEON COUNTIES THROUGH 130 AM EST... At 101 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Newport, Shadeville, Hells Half Acre, Leon Sinks, Fanlew, Wakulla Springs, Bethel, Natural Bridge, and Vereen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
